pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Django Channels auth token middlewares> Provides Django REST framework [token authentication](https://www.django-rest-framework.org/api-guide/authentication/#tokenauthentication) middleware, [Simple JWT](https://django-rest-framework-simplejwt.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html) middleware and easily extendable middlewares to work with auth tokens placed in request headers, cookie and query string.## Requirements- Python>=3.6- Channels>=3## Install1. `$ pip install channels-auth-token-middlewares`2. Add app name to `INSTALLED_APPS````pythonINSTALLED_APPS = [ # base django apps (django.contrib.auth is required) # other apps this one depends on (like rest_framework if it's necessary) 'channels_auth_token_middlewares', # custom apps]```## Tutorial[Explore](tutorial)## Docs[Explore](docs)## Tests### Requirements- Docker>=19- docker-compose>=1.25### Usage#### Run`$ docker-compose -f docker-compose.tests.yml up`#### Clean`$ docker-compose -f docker-compose.tests.yml down`
